name: Hungry Forg
description:
Hungry Forg

Forg is hungry, and he needs your help! Collect and eat flies while avoiding those pesky snakes! 

Tutorial

Click and drag your mouse to launch Forg in the direction of the mouse. The more you drag, the distance and speed of Forg increases. 

Made for Mini Jam by Aaron

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCidNP6RF0_CiRJsIl7fUTdQ
